__TOC__

This page explains which posts are OK to post to the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-jobs|ubuntu-jobs@lists.ubuntu.com mailing list]]</nowiki>.

Requirements are:
* Jobs must be posted in English
* Jobs post must come be directly from an employer (not agencies or recruiters)
* Posting must include details of company, role & method of contact.
* Jobs must be Ubuntu related (Obviously ;-) )
